welcome_message_body: Welcome to Luque, Paraguay! This charming city is known for its beautiful colonial architecture and vibrant artisan market. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Luque has to offer.

restaurants.name: Burger King
restaurants.description: Burger King is a fast food restaurant located in Luque.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Silvio Pettirossi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.
